>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.81JGPv0UP5kB8A56]{Vehicle Whisperer (Ex)}

You can use your extensive mechanical expertise to improve the performance of any vehicle. You can spend 1 Resolve Point to affect a vehicle you can touch. The vehicle gains a +1 enhancement bonus to EAC and KAC, it deals an additional 1d4 damage with collision attacks, and its movement speeds increase by 5 feet. If youâ€™re piloting this vehicle, its Piloting modifier increases by 2. These effects last for a number of hours equal to your Intelligence modifier before they revert back to their original values, whether or not you remain with the vehicle.
